com.epoch.textbooks

Class Textbook

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.textbooks.Textbook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorConstants, TextbookConstants

    public class Textbook
extends Object
implements TextbookConstants
    An online textbook.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean changed
      Whether chapters in this textbook have been added, reordered, or deleted.
      private List<TextChapter> chapters
      List of chapters in this book.
      private List<Integer> deletedChapterIds
      List of IDs of chapters deleted from this book.
      private int flags
      Flags of this book.
      private int id
      Textbook ID number.
      private String lockHolder
      The author or coauthor of this book who has authoring privileges at this time.
      private String name
      Textbook name.
      private String ownerId
      Textbook owner.

      Constructor.
      Textbook(String userId)
      Constructor.
      Textbook(Textbook copy)
      Copy constructor.
      Textbook(Textbook copy, String userId)
      Copy constructor; if userId is not same as ownerId, will set ID to 0 so it is written as a new textbook if it is saved.

                String userId,
                String bookName,
                int fl)
         throws ParameterException
        Constructor. Called by DB class.
        Parameters:
        bookId - ID number of the textbook
        bookName - name of the textbook
        userId - owner of the textbook
        fl - flags

        ParameterException - if userId is null

        Copy constructor.
        Parameters:
        copy - textbook being copied

      • Textbook

        public Textbook(Textbook copy,
                String userId)
         throws ParameterException
        Copy constructor; if userId is not same as ownerId, will set ID to 0 so it is written as a new textbook if it is saved.
        Parameters:
        copy - textbook being copied
        userId - owner of the copy of the textbook
        Throws:
        ParameterException - if userId is null

      • getNoncoauthors

        public User[] getNoncoauthors(int instnId)

        Returns:
        an array of verified instructor Users
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • moveChapter

        public void moveChapter(int fromPosn,
                        int toPosn)
        Moves a chapter.
        Parameters:
        fromPosn - 1-based position of chapter to move
        toPosn - 1-based position to which to move chapter

      • deleteChapter

        public void deleteChapter(int posn)
        Deletes a chapter.
        Parameters:
        posn - 1-based position of chapter to delete

      • moveContents

        public void moveContents(int startChapNum,
                         int[] range,
                         int targetChapNum,
                         int posn,
                         String newChapName)
        Moves content from one chapter to another or from one position to another.
        Parameters:
        startChapNum - 1-based number of the chapter from which the moved contents come
        range - 1-based range of contents to be moved
        targetChapNum - 1-based number of the chapter to which the contents are being moved
        posn - 1-based position to which the contents are being moved
        newChapName - new name of chapter if there is a new chapter

      • save

        public void save()
          throws DBException
        Saves the textbook.
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database
